content: this gorgeous phoebe hat has great texture and is the perfect compliment to the phoebe infinity scarf this pattern is one of the july contributions to the 2024 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 40-140 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn in 3 colors * size j 6 mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
